name: Pokémon Perfect Crystal
summary: Pokémon Perfect Crystal is an idealized definitive version of Pokemon Crystal that has every Pokemon available to catch and to fixes a number of glaring glitches that hampered the original game. It also restores the Celebi and GS Ball events, makes trade evolutions avalaible through evolution stones, makes TMs reusable, and changes opponents' levels to match Heartgold & SoulSilver.
